welcome.title: Welcome to TaskFuchs
welcome.subtitle: Your personal productivity assistant
welcome.description: Great to have you here! I'm TaskFuchs and I'm excited to get to know you.
welcome.fox_message: Hello! I'm TaskFuchs and I'm thrilled to meet you. Let's take your productivity to the next level together!

today_dashboard.title: Dashboard
today_dashboard.subtitle: Your daily overview
today_dashboard.description: This is where you start every day. All important information at a glance.
today_dashboard.fox_message: The dashboard is your command center! Here you can instantly see what's on for today, which deadlines are approaching, and how productive you've been. Perfect for starting your day!

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.subtitle: Collect everything in one place
inbox.description: Quickly capture thoughts and tasks, organize them later.
inbox.fox_message: The inbox is your catch-all for spontaneous ideas! Just throw everything in and sort it out later. You'll never forget anything important again!
inbox.empty_description: No tasks in inbox. Use the smart button to create new tasks.

smart_input.title: Smart Input
smart_input.subtitle: Speak naturally to TaskFuchs
smart_input.description: Create tasks with natural language - just type and you're done.
smart_input.fox_message: This is my superpower! Just write 'Meeting tomorrow at 10 #work !!' and I understand: title, date, tag, and priority. Magical, isn't it?

tasks.title: Daily Planner
tasks.subtitle: Work structured
tasks.description: Organize your tasks in clear columns.
tasks.fox_message: This is where things get organized! Drag tasks between columns, set priorities, and keep track. Your brain will thank you!

kanban.title: Kanban Boards
kanban.subtitle: Master projects
kanban.description: Manage complex projects with professional Kanban boards.
kanban.fox_message: For the big projects! Create boards for different projects and work in teams. This way you keep track even with complex endeavors!

notes.title: Notes
notes.subtitle: Capture thoughts
notes.description: Write, plan and connect your ideas with each other.
notes.fox_message: This is where your thoughts live! Write markdown notes, link them to tasks, and build your personal knowledge system. Brilliant, right?

focus.title: Focus Mode
focus.subtitle: Work concentrated
focus.description: Activate focus mode for distraction-free work with integrated timer.
focus.fox_message: Time for deep work! In focus mode you only see your current task and a timer. Perfect for Pomodoro sessions or when you want to really concentrate!

series.title: Recurring Tasks
series.subtitle: Automate routines
series.description: Create and manage recurring tasks for your regular routines.
series.fox_message: Never forget again! Create a series once and I'll make sure these tasks automatically reappear. Perfect for routines and regular to-dos!

review.title: Review System
review.subtitle: Reflect & optimize
review.description: Regularly look back at your tasks and optimize your productivity.
review.fox_message: Reflection makes you strong! The review system helps you think through your tasks, set priorities and continuously improve. Wisdom through repetition!

timer.title: Timer & Time Tracking
timer.subtitle: Keep time in focus
timer.description: Track your work time and use Pomodoro techniques for better productivity.
timer.fox_message: Tick, tock! The timer helps you use your time consciously. Start it for tasks, use Pomodoro sessions and see how productive you really are!

statistics.title: Reports & Statistics
statistics.subtitle: Understand your productivity
statistics.description: Get detailed insights into your work habits and productivity patterns.
statistics.fox_message: Numbers don't lie! Here you see how productive you really are. Recognize patterns, find your best working time and continuously optimize your performance!

smart_features.title: Smart Features
smart_features.subtitle: Modern productivity
smart_features.description: TaskFuchs learns your habits and helps you become more productive.
smart_features.fox_message: Now it gets really clever! I recognize patterns in your work, suggest optimizations and help you achieve your goals. This is modern productivity!

customization.title: Customization
customization.subtitle: Make it yours
customization.description: Adapt TaskFuchs to your needs and style.
customization.fox_message: Make me yours! Choose colors, themes, sounds, and layouts that suit you. TaskFuchs should feel like your personal workspace!

ready.title: Ready for the Journey
ready.subtitle: Let's get started!
ready.description: You're now ready to work productively with TaskFuchs.
ready.fox_message: Wow, that was a great tour! You now know all my superpowers. I'm so excited to become productive together with you. Let's go!

completion.title: 🎉 Welcome to TaskFuchs!
completion.subtitle: You're ready to be productive
completion.message: Your journey starts now. Good luck with TaskFuchs!
